name: The Nine Moons
overview: The Nine Moons is a Commodore 64 side-scrolling shooter developed by Jeremyl Thorne. The year of release is currently unknown. This game plays similar to Scramble, however instead of a spaceship, your character is a man/android with a jetpack and a laser. The game also has no color other than black, white, and grey.(although there is a little bit of blue in some of the stars/planets in the game's intro screen. Released under the name I Due Mondi in Italy's Special Program n.34 (luglio/agosto 1987) and Hit Parade C64 n.20 (Febbraio 1988).
